title: Motorola Moto G Stylus | 2022 | 2-Day battery | Unlocked| Made for US by Motorola | 6/128GB | 50MP Camera | Twilight Blue
description: Take your creativity to the next level. Meet moto g stylus. With a built-in stylus, you can sketch freely, add handwritten notes to photos, edit images, and more. Explore without boundaries thanks to a 2-day battery. Capture everything from ultra-wide images to extreme close-ups with a versatile 50 MP camera system. And do it all on a 6.8" Max Vision FHD+ display that brings movies and sketches to life in brilliant detail. With a fast, fluid 90 Hz refresh rate, viewing content is virtually free from annoying lag. Inside, there’s an octa-core processor to power your imagination, along with 128 GB of storage to hold what matters most.
